name: Shelton Interactive
description:
Shelton Interactive is a full-service digital agency for books and brands based in Austin, TX. Shelton Interactive has five key departments–web development, social media, public relations, design and SEO–and each department works hand-in-hand with the others to ensure our clients have a well-rounded, integrated digital strategy.
We head up digital strategy for some of the world’s most well known brands, including Chicken Soup for the Soul, Harvard Health Publications and a number of others and are strategic partner firms with the country's best business PR firm, Cave Henricks Communications.
Our mission is to provide our clients with the best agency experience they will ever have, with everything they need, under one roof.
Since our founding in 2010, we have handled digital strategy for 20+ New York Times, Wall Street Journal, USA Today and Inc. Magazine bestsellers.
